short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Validate OpenAir custom fields used in the script and audit the 'Selected Custom Fields' list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this chrome extension to audit the custom fields within an OpenAir script to validate if the field exists and is usable within the script.  It is helpful when deploying scripts from the sandbox to production or troubleshooting why a script suddenly stopped working.

Additionally, it also identifies fields that should be added or removed from the 'Selected Custom Fields' list.  By adding fields to this list, it will help admins identify where custom fields are used.

To use the tool:
1)Install the chrome extension
2)Navigate to OpenAir's scripting center and open a script (code must be visible in on the screen)
3)Click the extension icon from the list of available chrome extensions
4)Click "Audit Script"
5)The audit will run immediately and provide feedback in the extension pop-up window
